attributes.action: Make government adhere to the recommendations of independent pay review panels
attributes.additional_details: Given the governments acceptance of their independent panel review of MP's pay at an 11% rise, they have hypocritically rejected parts of the NHS independent pay review which was only for a 1% rise!! Make government policy require acceptance of all independent pay reviews to employ fairness and impartiality.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter
